      • getReadAnnouncementsAsUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/user/read",
                method=GET)
public String getReadAnnouncementsAsUser​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                         Principal principal)
        Gets a list of Announcements for the current User
        Parameters:
        model - Model for the view
        principal - The user fetching the announcements (usually the one currently logged in)
        Returns:
        The announcement page containing announcement information for the user

public String getUnreadAnnouncementsForUser​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                            Principal principal)
        Gets a list of Announcements that the current user hasn't read yet
        Parameters:
        model - Model for the view
        principal - The current user
        Returns:
        the fragment for viewing announcements in the dashboard

                method=POST)
public String markAnnouncementRead​(@PathVariable
                                   Long aID,
                                   Principal principal)
        Marks the announcement as read by the current user
        Parameters:
        aID - ID of the Announcement to be marked
        principal - The current user
        Returns:
        The fragment for viewing announcements in the dashboard

      • submitUpdatedAnnouncement

        @RequestMapping(value="/{announcementID}/details",
                method=POST)
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
public String submitUpdatedAnnouncement​(@PathVariable
                                        long announcementID,
                                        @RequestParam(required=false)
                                        String message,
                                        org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Updates an existing announcement object in the database
        Parameters:
        announcementID - The ID of the announcement to be updated
        message - The content of the updated announcement
        model - The model for the view
        Returns:
        A redirect to the announcement control center page

      • deleteAnnouncement

        @RequestMapping("/{announcementID}/delete")
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
public String deleteAnnouncement​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                 @PathVariable
                                 long announcementID)
        Delete an announcement from the database
        Parameters:
        model - The model for the view
        announcementID - The ID of the announcement to be deleted
        Returns:
        A redirect to the announcement control center page

@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
public String getAnnouncementDetailsPage​(@PathVariable
                                         long announcementID,
                                         org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Get the details page for a particular announcement
        Parameters:
        announcementID - The announcement whose data will be displayed
        model - The model for the view

      • getUserAnnouncementInfoTable

        @RequestMapping(value="/{announcementID}/details/ajax/list",
                method=GET)
@PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
@ResponseBody
public DataTablesResponse getUserAnnouncementInfoTable​(@PathVariable
                                                       Long announcementID,
                                                       @DataTablesRequest
                                                       DataTablesParams params)
        Get user read status for current announcement
        Parameters:
        announcementID - Long identifier for the Announcement
        params - DataTablesParams parameters for current DataTable
        Returns:
        DataTablesResponse containing the list of users.
